Renamed PR because it actually did not happen while hovering in the view but
rather while hovering on the view parts.

Not reproducibly after opening closing Eclipse so far.

Happened to me too the very first time i started M8.
No more able to reproduce it after that.

I also found this exception in my log once (I believe while dragging a
fastview)... but I was not able to reproduce it.

It would have been possible for PresentationUtil to throw a widget is disposed
error in the following scenario:
1. A mousedown ocurred on the edge of one tab folder
2. The mouse moved over a second tab folder without moving far enough to trigger
a drag in the first one
3. The first tab folder is disposed
4. The mouse moves far enough to trigger a drag.

I've submitted a patch that removes this possibility, although I cannot find a
way to trigger this senario within the UI.
*** Bug 56654 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 56365 ***
